trans-unit.source:
\n

Represents time in divisions, such as months, days, and years.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxx$ xxxx xx xxxxxx$ xxxx$ xxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
Years are calculated as for the Japanese calendar, while days and months are calculated using the lunisolar calendar.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxx Xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx$ xxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An array of 32-bit signed integers that specify the relevant eras.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxx xx 00$xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An integer that represents the era specified in the time parameter.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx $xx$xxxx$$xx$ xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x
